title: House | for | Sale | Ward Place | Colombo 7
details:
DESCRIPTION
It is a seven bed roomed spacious house situated in Colombo 7 & consists of a spacious sitting & dinning room, five bed rooms including a spacious master bed room with an attached bathroom, an pantry with fitted cupboards.

LOCATION
House is located in a tranquil & peaceful highly residential & well secured convenient location Ward Place, Colombo7 & is situated with close proximity to supermarkets, leading International as well as local schools, also close to banks, hospitals, places of worship, the post office etc.etc, it is only about few minutes drive to the Colombo city center & close to most of the towns in & around Colombo & the suburbs, from this location.
